title: Gold Case
description: Deal or No Deal meets Millionaire! Ten models each hold an identical suitcase, but one of them is filled with $1,000,000 worth of solid gold.
quote: You struck gold on Gold Case!
altHero: woman in green dress struggles to hold up a heavy suitcase
alt2: contestant high fives John McEnroe in front of the row of ladies with suitcases
alt3: another woman struggles to hold the suitcase
